text.text: *Hi USERNAME! My name is Slack Lackey and I am ready and waiting to share your favorite code snippets with the world,* (_or at least the portion of the world with a GitHub_) *by saving them as Gists in a shared GitHub account.*
If you call me with *@Slack Lackey help* - I will show this message :sunglasses:.
If you share a portion of code wrapped in ``` I will ask you if you want to save it as a Gist.

If you create a code snippet by clicking the :heavy_plus_sign: to the left of the message input box, I will ask if you want to save it as a Gist.

 *Reminder: * _Don't forget to give your code snippet a Title and a Type. If you forget, I can still do my work but you may have a harder time querying your snippet later._

 If you say you want to save your snippet as a Gist, I will ask you a few more questions

fields.text: A list of common data structures
Tips and tricks for common code tools

text.text: *Note:* You can choose 0 to 1 option per drop down menu.
*Need additonal keywords?* Ask my creators to add them for you!

Click *'Save as a Gist!'*

I will do all of the work for you and send you back a message with your new Gist url and a button you can use to go visit it on GitHub.

If you feel like sharing, you can also share your new Gist with your channel!

All you have to do is click *'Share to Channel'*
If you call me with *@Slack Lackey get all gists*, I will go get a list of all of the Gists in the GitHub linked to this channel.
If you call me with *@Slack Lackey get [keyword] gists*, I will bring back a list of Gists with that keyword.

*Notes:* 
All keywords must be lowercase. 
_*Example:* mongo || linked list || css tricks_

You can search for partial keywords.
_*Example:* css || hash || list_
If you call me with *@Slack Lackey get my gists*, I will bring back a list of Gists that you have previously created.
If you call me with *@Slack Lackey get gists from [mm/dd/yy]*, I will bring back a list of Gists that were created on that date.
If you call me with *@Slack Lackey get gists from [mm/dd/yy] and [mm/dd/yy]*, I will bring back a list of Gists that were created inclusive of and between those dates.
*It has been nice to meet you! Learn more about my family by clicking the button below...*
